message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better offer anywhere else.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the enthusiasm around the product, but I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose an offer of $950000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. Considering the product's value and the market demand, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1100000. This is a fair price, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still looking to keep my spending within my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $1000000.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1050000. This is a premium product, and I believe it's worth every penny. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a counteroffer of $1050000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $1025000.

I'm glad you're willing to make a serious offer, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1075000. I think this product is worth every penny, and I'm willing to make a slight concession to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to offer a counteroffer of $1075000. This is the final offer I'm willing to make.
I respect your position, Alice. After evaluating the situation, I would like to propose an offer of $1050000.

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to offer a counteroffer of $1075000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $1060000.
